pullrequest.title: Rerun failed integration and regression tests in gazebo on linux

content.raw:
:blue_circle: because of this branch; it had some flaky tests

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-default-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/305/testReport/(root)/WorldRemoveTest_WorldRemoveTest/RemoveBlankWorld_3/
* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-default-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/305/testReport/(root)/PhysicsEngines_ContactSensor/ModelRemoval_0/
* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-default-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/305/testReport/(root)/PhysicsEngines_ContactSensor/ModelRemoval_2/
* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-default-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/305/testReport/(root)/PhysicsEngines_ContactSensor/ModelRemoval_3/
